exp_moonstudy_1:
Â§7The MoonÂ§f is beautiful tonight! I wonder what it's like to be up there...
I might learn some new things if I keep watching...
exp_moonstudy_2:
Â§bÂ§lRevelation 1:Â§fÂ§r
Â§7The MoonÂ§f bears heavy resemblance with... Â§eCheese?Â§f 
Â§bÂ§o[Moon Study Progress: 20%%]
exp_moonstudy_3:
Â§bÂ§lRevelation 2:Â§fÂ§r
Â§7Â§mThe MoonÂ§fÂ§m is oddly small?Â§r 
Â§7The MoonÂ§f seems to be VERY far away. 
Â§bÂ§o[Moon Study Progress: 40%%]
exp_moonstudy_4:
Â§bÂ§lRevelation 3:Â§fÂ§r
I need to travel very fast to espace the Â§aEarthsÂ§f gravitational forces... 
Â§bÂ§o[Moon Study Progress: 60%%]
exp_moonstudy_5:
Â§bÂ§lRevelation 4:Â§fÂ§r
Maybe I can use explosives to blast myself to Â§7The Moon?Â§f It's only rocket science after all. 
Â§bÂ§o[Moon Study Progress: 80%%]
exp_moonstudy_6:
The stars revealed their secrets to me! I invented Â§4Â§lspacetravel! 
Â§bÂ§o[Moon Study Progress: 100%%]
exp_guide1_desc: This book will guide you on your journey to the stars.
exp_guide1_oxygen_body:
Â§cÂ§lOxygenÂ§r is a luxury in space! Use Â§3Â§lOxygenÂ§r Â§3Â§lTanksÂ§r as a portable source of oxygen on your travels, and refill them with the Â§3Â§lCompressorÂ§r. 

For Space Bases, the Â§cÂ§lOxygenatorÂ§r and Â§2Â§lTerraformerÂ§r can provide a permanent oxygen supply.
exp_guide1_temperature_body:
Space can be very Â§bÂ§lColdÂ§r or Â§6Â§lHotÂ§r. Your Â§3Â§lSpacesuitÂ§r protects you against these rough conditions. 

Â§cÂ§lBewareÂ§r that your Â§3Â§lSpacesuitÂ§r will take Â§8Â§lDurabilityÂ§r damage from the environment if its Â§bÂ§lColdÂ§r/Â§6Â§lHotÂ§r Â§7Â§lResistanceÂ§r is insufficient.
exp_guide1_spacesuit_body:
Your Â§3Â§lSpacesuitÂ§r provides Â§cÂ§lOxygenÂ§r and protects you against extreme Â§bÂ§lColdÂ§r or Â§6Â§lHeatÂ§r. Taking care of your suit is of utmost importance, as a damaged suit leaks Â§cÂ§lOxygenÂ§r. 
Â§9Â§lModulesÂ§r can enhance the resistances of your suit. 
Repair your Spacesuit with a Â§8Â§lRepair KitÂ§r.
exp_guide1_checklist_body:
ðŸ—¹ A trusty Â§3Â§lSpacesuitÂ§r

ðŸ—¹ A reliable Â§6Â§lRocketÂ§r

ðŸ—¹ Plenty of Â§cÂ§lOxygenÂ§r

ðŸ—¹ A Â§8Â§lRepair KitÂ§r

ðŸ—¹ An Â§cÂ§lOxygenatorÂ§r, Â§3Â§lCompressorÂ§r and Â§2Â§lLeavesÂ§r if I plan on staying

on the ground!

on the fly!

Â§7
May be dropped by a very protective Â§6Â§lDroneÂ§r...

ambient temperature score exceeds 
its respective resistance score.

exp_vehicles_buggy_tip1: Â§7 â€¢ Leftclick when placed to pick back up.

exp_screentxt_nofuel_subtitle: Hold 16 Blaze Powder and try again
exp_screentxt_swaptank_subtitle_inship: Â§cFuel Cells can only be swapped from Â§noutsideÂ§rÂ§c the ship
exp_screentxt_loaderror_chat: The Expansion was not installed correctly, the custom dimensions didn't load. Try rejoining or restarting your world and make sure that you are not playing on an incompatible server jar.
exp_screentxt_solarsystemsuccess_chat: <Â§9The ExpansionÂ§r> Solar System generation completed successfully!
exp_screentxt_oxygen_blockcap: Â§cMax Size exceeded (20x20x20), room is too large.
exp_screentxt_oxygen_scancap: Â§cScan capacity (100) exceeded, room is too vast.
exp_screentxt_oxygen_nobreathe: Â§cThe air is no longer breathable.
exp_screentxt_oxygen_breathe: Â§aThe air inside is breathable now.
exp_screentxt_stoptick1: All functions from The Expansion are disabled, it will no longer contribute to any lag.
exp_screentxt_stoptick2: Â§cÂ§lDO NOT DELETE THE FILES FROM YOUR WORLD!
exp_screentxt_stoptick3: Deleting it will break your world/server.
exp_advancement_coolingmodmk2_desc: Obtain a better Heat Resistance Module.
exp_advancement_coolingmodmk3_desc: Find the BEST Heat Resistance Module.
exp_advancement_troopersuit_desc: Find an alien Spacesuit on Mars
exp_advancement_pilotsuit_desc: Find an alien Spacesuit on Jupiter
exp_advancement_earthcrash_desc: Gently return to Earth with a Return capsule.
exp_advancement_europa_desc: Go to Europa, there is something hidden deep beneath the surface...
exp_advancement_getguide_desc: Look at The Moon with a spyglass and a Book and Quill in your offhand.
exp_advancement_getarcfurnace_desc: Craft an Arc Furnace, good luck smelting your first Steel Ingots!
exp_advancement_getfabricator_desc: Craft a Fabricator, your general purpose sci-fi Crafter!
exp_advancement_getplanetarium_desc: Buy, find or craft a Planetarium.
exp_advancement_getrocket_desc: Construct the Rocket by placing the Rocket Parts on top of each other.
exp_advancement_getsteel_desc: Create Steel by combining raw iron and coal in the Arc Furnace.
exp_advancement_jupiterstation_desc: Locate the Jupiter Fleet using a fleet Finder.
exp_advancement_jupiter_desc: Enter Jupiter, the largest planet in the Solar System.
exp_advancement_lacrymae_desc: Obtain Lacrymae from a Lacrymae Extractor.
exp_advancement_mfalconloot_desc: Find all hidden chests in the Millennium Falcon.
exp_advancement_mars_desc: Go to Mars and behold the endless red desert.
exp_advancement_mercury_desc: Visit Mercury, be careful not to burn your feet.
exp_advancement_mfalcon_desc: Find the Millennium Falcon, why is it on the Moon?
exp_advancement_ehorizon_title: Best Pilot I Have Ever Seen
exp_advancement_ehorizon_desc: Find the 'landing' site of San Holo's white and blue ship.
exp_advancement_moon_title: One Small Step For A Man...
exp_advancement_moon_desc: Succesfully land on The Moon, congratulations!
exp_advancement_pocketspace_desc: Enter your own personal pocket space.
exp_advancement_root_desc: Are you ready to expand Minecraft beyond the atmosphere of the Earth?
exp_advancement_space_desc: Reach the realm of Space, far beyond the atmosphere.
exp_advancement_venus_desc: Enter the thick and hazardous atmosphere of Venus.
exp_advancement_warmingmodmk2_desc: Obtain a better Cold Resistance Module.
exp_advancement_warmingmodmk3_desc: Find the BEST Cold Resistance Module.
exp_advancement_gettitanium_desc: Find Titanium in the deepest Moon caves.
exp_advancement_getamethonium_desc: Craft Amethonium by combining Raw Titantium and Amethyst Shards in an Arc Furnace.
exp_advancement_getrailgun_desc: Assemble the handheld Railgun. Have fun shooting your friends (if you have any).
exp_advancement_ridebuggy_desc: Traverse the surface of The Moon with a Moon Buggy.
exp_advancement_getdrone_desc: Assemble the Scanning Drone. It will keep you company in lonely times.
exp_advancement_getcryonite_desc: Mine Cryonite out of its obsidian shell.
exp_advancement_getvulcanium_desc: Find a rare spike of Vulcanium in the caves of Venus.
exp_advancement_warbase_desc: Enter the massive abandoned Research Facility on Mars.
exp_advancement_recyclecapsule_desc: Recycle the Return Capsule using a Wrench.
exp_advancement_getenhancer_desc: Obtain an Enhancer, it applies Modules to your Spacesuit!
exp_advancement_getextractor_desc: Obtain an Extractor, which extracts Lacrymae from Crying Obsidian
exp_advancement_getassembler_desc: Craft the Assembler, the largest crafting station.
exp_advancement_buggyhit_desc: You are a menace to society.
exp_advancement_getaiunit_title: Nobody Move! I Dropped My Brain
exp_advancement_getaiunit_desc: Harvest an AI Unit from a very protective drone.
exp_advancement_gatewaydebris_desc: You have been prankster dankstered by VonLeipenstein
exp_advancement_special_thanks_root_desc: To all those who helped me make The Expansion.
death.attack.zapped: %1$s's life shockingly came to an end
death.attack.space_freeze: %1$s froze to death in the cold vacuum of space
death.attack.space_burn: %1$s tried to defy the scorching heat of the Sun
death.attack.space_suffocate: %1$s forgot that you can't breathe in space...
death.attack.drone_laser: %1$s got lasered by a tiny flying space robot
